ygData.msgSnippet: the idea of targetting a player and being able to t-port to that player s corpse LOL!  i can see it now! :) scenario 1: Group of 24 fights their way thru the
ygData.messageBody:
the idea of targetting a player and being able to t-port to that player's
corpse
LOL! i can see it now! :)

scenario 1:

Group of 24 fights their way thru the first island in Air. use keys to get to
2nd island in air. then, someone duels another person there, your 20 50th
level bards all target that person (at their bind point) and teleport to his
corpse's location. Cleric ressurrects the duels loser. heh...a teleporting
army of bards.

scenario 2:
Group fights all the way thru kedge keep to Phingel's area....then calls in
their "teleporting army of bards" (tm) [via the process described above]to
assist with the final fight...

err...i think you get the idea.

that would be really funny.

Kinda reminds me of 1st edition AD&D barbarians [unearthed arcana] that could
"Summon a Barbarian horde" to fight for them. does that date me :) ?

Kaleid
23rd song
Glyphed Aegiss
27th DE Magician
<Wave of the Dark Tide>
Prexus
